description:
Whether at work or at play, The Ottawa Citizen app for the Touchpad keeps you connected to the news stories, sports results, weather updates and entertainment features you want to read – when you want to read them.  The Ottawa Citizen Touchpad app combines our most compelling stories and photos to create an interactive reading experience that is optimized especially for the HP Touchpad. 

In each edition you will find in-depth local, national and international coverage on topics that matter to you and your community.  The Ottawa Citizen Touchpad app supports offline reading, allowing you to download stories to enjoy in places where a wireless internet connection is not available.

Find a story you’re passionate about?  Be the first to break to the news to your friends.  Simply tap the screen to share the story via Twitter, Facebook or e-mail. 


Features:
- Photo Galleries featuring our best photos
- Sharing tools: connect to Facebook, Twitter and e-mail
- Weather reports
- Market indices
- News updates throughout the day.


Stay up to date with what’s happening across Canada with a full suite of apps from Postmedia Network:

The Times Colonist (Victoria)
The Vancouver Sun, 
The Province (Vancouver)
The Calgary Herald, 
The Edmonton Journal
The Leader-Post (Regina)
The StarPhoenix (Saskatoon)
The Windsor Star
The Gazette (Montreal)
The National Post
